name: varnish
text: Lyle in this strip is basically every roommate I've ever had.

name: tripperday
text: I've done two out of three.

name: fineoakstructure
text: Why you doing 2 of varnish's 3 roommates, tripper?  They sound pretty nasty.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: How come?

name: weretrout
text: WHY FIND OUT?

name: mockereo
text: A comment left by mockereo was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by jyri00555, Scorpio_nadir, fakedaisies, kestral)

name: terribleman
text: Uh, because they are Lyle in this strip?

name: tripperday
text: I've clipped my toenails on the couch and peed in the sink.

name: wazza
text: puking in the dishwasher does seem to be the one that's really beyond the pale

name: afrothunder
text: Is that supposed to be a bad thing? Who wouldn't want to live with Lyle?

name: whuppins
text:
Without any of the cats, and with its more straightforward setup-punchline approach, this strip reminds me of 'old school' Achewood.

Just sayin'

name: prettyrad
text: Even early Achewood rarely had a punchline as such... this strip feels really weird, like I'm missing something. But still, classic Lyle .

name: chaesar
text: I knew a woman who'd do that during research assistant meetings in graduate school. I think she even cut her toenails once.

name: jackparsons
text: There it is appropriate behavior. She should then paint your toenails.

name: kaseli
text: Are you kidding?? Why so few comments? This is one of the best achewood strips, in my opinion. Achewood needs less Ray/Beef storylines, not that they're bad, it just feels like Lyle/Teodor/Cornelius have been neglected :(

name: cdl146
text: I do feel like Ray and Beef get too much 'screen time.' It's not that there is anything wrong with them, it's just that the other characters could become much more three dimensional if they had a chance.

name: ocarinak
text: A comment left by ocarinak was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by 7th_shot, al_batross, achilleselbow, Satyr, SotiCoto)

name: achilleselbow
text: Actually the Beef/Teodor strips have proven to be my favorite ones, probably because they're the two characters I can relate the most to.

name: zapatos
text: BeefxTeodor?

name: woodenteeth
text: No Zapatos. Bad Zapatos. We'll have none of that fanned fiction.

name: ih8jonmayr
text: What we need more of is Todd.

name: gkiyo
text: Lyle confesses, yet does not.  Delicate.

name: heavymetaljesus
text: I am all sorts of okay with peeing in sinks.

name: anonymous44
text: as long as you hand-wash with extra hot water and soap

name: soticoto
text:
Or bleach in my case.
And I didn't even pee in that sink.

My hands were burning after I had to reach in to pull out the plug though. I should have thought about that before I filled the sink with bleach.

name: nicolae
text:
Everytime you flush, you wash about a cup and a half of urine down with about 3 gallons of water.

Save a drink. Pee in the sink.

name: cbtbone
text: Once you pee in a sink, it is no longer a sink.  It is a urinal.  Which makes your kitchen a public bathroom.  Which leaves you with a completely new problem:  What will you do about all those hobos shaving and changing clothes in your kitchen?

name: crumpetsandtea
text: i am sort of okay with puking in the dishwasher

name: cbtbone
text: I mean, couldn't you just run it once with no dishes in it?  Or would it still smell after?

name: cbtbone
text: Okay, maybe twice.

name: crumpetsandtea
text: psh ill put my dishes in there with it man i aint about to waste no water

name: cbtbone
text: Good point, I mean, you already ate it once, it couldn't have been that bad.

name: terribleman
text: It would be clean puke.

name: wae
text: lyle must have woken up with the gin already in him.

name: ishbario
text: lyle was born wasted wae.

name: k_buttsworthe
text: this is just funny. ain't no bones about it.

name: crinklebat
text: I just learned what "hat trick" means! Thanks, Achewood, for widening my world.

name: soticoto
text: A comment left by soticoto was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by saddestking, jaredwilde, TonyHighwind, coffeecoaster, Towel, gnjdfsgk)

name: breadcrab
text: I'm going to start calling it Armoured Rugby now. Thank you, WCC.

name: mulisha7
text: A-Ha-HA-Ha! That is the most awesome description of football I have ever read.

name: jonmw
text: I think I'll use the word "Padded" rather than "Armoured"

name: tonyhighwind
text:
That bullshit might mean a lot more if you weren't a bitter welsh prick with delusions of both adequacy and racial superiority. I'll take an organized 100-yard strategy over your disorganized, grabass hodge-podge excuse to get wasted and throw a ball around any day.

England, here is a hint: You do not need an excuse to get wasted and throw a ball around.

name: soticoto
text:
Do shut your noisehole, in whatever form it takes.
You are of less than any worth and I can't even bring myself to read your stupid comments any more.

name: zorglemeister
text: I've always known "Hat Trick" from Hockey...  but I guess that's just my Canadian half showing.

name: woodenteeth
text: I immediately assumed he was talking about Cricket. It is a sport wide descriptor then...

name: budenhagen
text: Puking in the dishwasher. Such a thing is so hilarious I think I had a heart attack.

name: goocifer
text: This strip kind of reminds me of the first year of achewood

name: shineboxx
text: Let's not forget shitting in the washing machine.

name: soticoto
text:
And you KNOW you have to turn it on to watch it spin...

... unless you have one of those lame top-lid washing machines that you can't watch from the front.

name: johnnyrocker
text: The search identifies that bottle as being full of achewater, but there is no proof of it in the strip itself! Weird.

name: pogo
text:
Not being a hockey fan, I had to think a minute, and then BWAAAA-HAA-HAAAA.

(I mean, what guy hasn't peed in a sink?)

name: speth
text: A comment left by speth was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by apocowarg, kenthegod, Lumus, HaraDaya, erinye, Tashara)

name: echidnaboy
text: Heh! Classic Lyle.

name: red-barchetta
text: This one got a 5 for Lyles last line. He may have said it just to piss off T but I think he's for real.
